about_the_game:
Introducing BattleGuild, an action-packed top-down dungeon crawler set in a grimdark fantasy world. Join the ranks of an esteemed guild of Adventurers, undertaking dangerous quests to slay monstrous creatures and protect the realm. With an arsenal of diverse heroes at your disposal, forge your own path to glory.

Customize your playstyle by creating unique runes and item builds for each hero, strategically shaping their abilities and strengths. As you venture forth, your heroes will level up independently, unlocking powerful skills and becoming formidable forces against ever-growing threats.

Prepare for endless possibilities as you embark on your adventures. Each quest takes place on a dynamically generated map, ensuring no two encounters are the same. Explore treacherous environments, unearth hidden treasures, and confront increasingly daunting foes as you progress. The excitement never wanes.

Engage in lightning-fast combat that combines the best elements of Diablo and Doom Eternal. Experience the adrenaline rush of mowing down hordes of menacing creatures, unleashing devastating combos, and reveling in your sheer power. BattleGuild will leave you exhilarated and thirsting for more.

For those seeking competition, test your mettle on the online leaderboard. Rise through the ranks, showcasing your skills and securing your place among the elite. The leaderboard adds an arcade-like feel to the experience, fueling your competitive spirit.

Designed with full controller support from the ground up, you'll feel immersed in the action, effortlessly controlling your heroes as you decimate your enemies.

With its captivating, fast-paced gameplay, captivating dark fantasy setting, and focus on player progression. Whether you prefer short or extended sessions, every moment spent in the game feels rewarding as you witness your heroes grow stronger, and the challenges become more formidable.

Prepare to join the BattleGuild and forge your legend. Wishlist now to be among the first to embark on this epic adventure.
